import React,{useEffect, useState} from "react"; import SideBar from "../Navbar/sidebar"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from "axios"; const ViewPro = () => { const [admin, setAdmin] = useState([]); const [bank, setBank] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get( 'admin/viewprofile').then(response=>{ if(response.data.status === 200){ setAdmin(response.data.admin); setBank(response.data.bank); } }); }, []); return(

Shakib's Information
First Name {bank.firstname}
Last Name {bank.lastname}
Gender {bank.gender}
Date Of Birth {bank.dateofbirth}
Phone {bank.phone}
Email {bank.email}
Nid No {bank.nid}
Admin Name {admin.adminname}
Password {admin.password}
Salary {admin.adminsalary}


); } export default ViewPro;
